title: FS Old Judge Metamorphic Advertising Card Sold
author: rootsearcher60

posts.post_title: FS Old Judge Metamorphic Advertising Card Sold
posts.post_content:
Selling an Old Judge Metamorphic Advertising Card in good condition. Crease on upper part behind the standing boy. Hinge wear but 98% attached. Tiny cut on hinge at far right. Overprint of terms of redemption from 35 to 25 slips. 
Asking $sold shipped by trackable method or best offer. PPFF please, or add 3% for regular PP.

Michael
[url]fiveelgins@gmail.com[/url]
